plot: A priest, loved by all, goes away of his parish, his friends, his country. He leaves everything for an uncertain fate... Through the personal progress of a man, the film reveals a thirst of the internal truth.
title: Loin de Rome
plot_es: A priest, loved by all, goes away of his parish, his friends, his country. He leaves everything for an uncertain fate... Through the personal progress of a man, the film reveals a thirst of the internal truth.
